statements: SELECT * FROM user_feedback WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT id, rating, review FROM user_feedback WHERE vr_experience_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, feedback_date FROM user_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT id, vr_experience_id, rating, review FROM user_feedback WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM user_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM user_feedback WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, avg(rating) FROM user_feedback GROUP BY user_id HAVING avg(rating) > 3
SELECT user_id, count(*) as feedback_count FROM user_feedback GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY feedback_count DESC
SELECT MAX(rating) as highest_rating, MIN(rating) as lowest_rating FROM user_feedback
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as total_feedback FROM user_feedback WHERE vr_experience_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_feedback > 2
SELECT * FROM user_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM user_feedback WHERE user_id = 1234;
SELECT experience_name, platform FROM vr_experiences WHERE price < 50.00 ORDER BY experience_name;
SELECT user_id, vr_experience_id FROM user_feedback WHERE rating >= 4 AND feedback_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT platform FROM vr_experiences;
SELECT * FROM user_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, rating, feedback_text FROM user_feedback WHERE user_id = 1002 AND vr_experience_id = 5001;
SELECT feedback_date, user_id, rating, feedback_text FROM user_feedback WHERE rating <= 2 AND vr_experience_id = 5002 ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, platform, price FROM vr_experiences WHERE price > 0 AND platform = 'Oculus Rift' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT experience_name, description, price FROM vr_experiences WHERE price BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY experience_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserFeedback WHERE user_id = '60d56d0a-2e07-4c48-af04-8c108d7d3353';
SELECT feedback_id, rating FROM UserFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM VRExperiences WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM UserFeedback WHERE experience_id = 'd1d8d8ff-29f2-45d6-8481-19cade1c218e' ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, rating, comment FROM UserFeedback WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY rating ASC;
SELECT * FROM VRExperiences WHERE release_date >= '2022-01-01' AND release_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY release_date ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE username LIKE '%john%' OR email LIKE '%gmail.com%' ORDER BY username ASC;

SELECT UserFeedback.feedback_id, UserFeedback.rating, VRExperiences.title FROM UserFeedback INNER JOIN VRExperiences ON UserFeedback.experience_id = VRExperiences.experience_id WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM user_feedback;
SELECT username, feedback FROM user_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT experience_name, description FROM vr_experiences ORDER BY experience_id DESC;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM reviews WHERE rating < 3 ORDER BY review_id ASC;
SELECT experience_name, suggested_improvements FROM vr_experiences JOIN improvements ON vr_experiences.experience_id = improvements.experience_id;
SELECT * FROM user_feedback ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, rating FROM user_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT experience_name, description FROM vr_experiences WHERE description LIKE '%exciting%' AND experience_name LIKE '%fun%';

SELECT u.username, r.rating, e.experience_name FROM user_feedback u JOIN reviews r ON u.user_id = r.user_id JOIN vr_experiences e ON r.experience_id = e.experience_id WHERE e.experience_name = 'Virtual Rollercoaster';

SELECT e.experience_name, i.suggested_improvements FROM vr_experiences e JOIN improvements i ON e.experience_id = i.experience_id WHERE i.suggested_improvements IS NOT NULL ORDER BY e.experience_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserFeedback;
SELECT user_id, feedback FROM UserFeedback WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT vr_experience_id, rating FROM VrExperience WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT name, email FROM User ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT review_text FROM Review WHERE vr_experience_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM UserFeedback WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT u.name, vf.feedback, ve.description FROM User u JOIN UserFeedback vf ON u.user_id = vf.user_id JOIN VrExperience ve ON vf.vr_experience_id = ve.vr_experience_id WHERE ve.rating > 4
SELECT r.review_text, u.name, ve.description FROM Review r JOIN User u ON r.user_id = u.user_id JOIN VrExperience ve ON r.vr_experience_id = ve.vr_experience_id WHERE u.email = 'example@example.com'

SELECT u.name, i.description, ve.description, r.review_text FROM User u JOIN Improvement i ON u.user_id = i.vr_experience_id JOIN VrExperience ve ON i.vr_experience_id = ve.vr_experience_id JOIN Review r ON i.vr_experience_id = r.vr_experience_id
SELECT * FROM VrExperience WHERE rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4
